org.apache.storm.scheduler.resource

クラス RAS_Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.scheduler.resource.RAS_Node

  • public class RAS_Node
extends Object

    Represents a single node in the cluster.

      • findTopologyUsingWorker

        public TopologyDetails findTopologyUsingWorker(WorkerSlot ws)

        Find a which topology is running on a worker slot

        戻り値:
        the topology using the worker slot. If worker slot is free then return null

      • assign

        public void assign(WorkerSlot target,
                   TopologyDetails td,
                   Collection<ExecutorDetails> executors)

        Assigns a worker to a node

        パラメータ:
        target - the worker slot to assign the executors
        td - the topology the executors are from
        executors - executors to assign to the specified worker slot

      • consumeMemory

        public Double consumeMemory(Double amount)

        Consumes a certain amount of memory for this node

        パラメータ:
        amount - is the amount memory to consume from this node
        戻り値:
        the current available memory for this node after consumption

      • consumeCPU

        public Double consumeCPU(Double amount)

        Consumes a certain amount of cpu for this node

        パラメータ:

        戻り値:
        the current available cpu for this node after consumption

      • consumeResourcesforTask

        public void consumeResourcesforTask(ExecutorDetails exec,
                                    TopologyDetails topo)

        Consumes a certain amount of resources for a executor in a topology.

        パラメータ:
        exec - is the executor that is consuming resources on this node
        topo - the topology the executor is a part
